meanings.definition: Opposing or rejecting traditional masculine behavior or attitudes.
meanings.sent1: She admired his antimacho stance on gender roles.
meanings.sent2: The group promoted an antimacho approach to leadership.
meanings.sent3: His antimacho fashion sense always turned heads.
meanings.sent4: Her antimacho demeanor challenged societal norms.
meanings.sent5: The antimacho movement gained momentum in the community.

meanings.definition: A person who opposes or rejects traditional masculine behavior or attitudes.
meanings.sent1: As an antimacho, he stood up against toxic masculinity.
meanings.sent2: She was proud to be known as an antimacho among her peers.
meanings.sent3: The antimacho at the party was the life of the event.
meanings.sent4: He was a true antimacho, breaking stereotypes with ease.
meanings.sent5: The antimacho's confidence inspired others to be themselves.
